name: Uragun
storyline:
Take control of a friendly-but-deadly Mech unit. Face endless hordes of corrupted machines, gear up, and improvise your way out of trouble in this action-packed, futuristic top-down shooter.

You play as a charming Mech unit that has awakened to discover a world overrun by corrupted AI. In order to survive, you must master your weapons and learn how to fight back against every enemy.
summary: Uragun is an action-packed, futuristic top-down shooter. Play as a deadly-but-adorable mech unit and improvise your way out of trouble.
